title: Jesus
text: Any time, as action, you can discard a card to give +1{Li} to this character.

title: Gravos
text: Whenever this character is target of an action card, choose one: Receive +1{At} or Receive +1{Sh}.

title: Olive
text: Any time, as action, you can discard a card to give +1{At} to this character.

title: Miros
text: Whenever you use an opportunity card you can discard a card, and then draw a card.

title: Salleon
text: Whenever you counter an action you can draw a card.

title: Driogos
text: Whenever you draw a card of an action card, you draw an additional card of it.

title: Eliaj
text: Whenever this character is target of a action card, choose one: Receive +1{At} or Receive +1{Li}.

title: Khastus
text: Any time, as an action, you can discard a cards to give +1 {At} and +1{Li} to this character.

title: Serianna
text: Whenever you cast opportunity card, choose one: Receive +1{Sh} or Receive +1{Li}.

title: Galleon
text: Any time, as action, you can discard a card to give +1{Sh} to this character.

title: Barbosa
text: Any time, as action, you can discard a card to allow this character attack.

title: Attack
text: You can attack with target character this turn. The damage is based on the character base status.

title: Attack
text: You can attack with target character this turn. The damage is based on the character base status plus 2

title: Attack
text: You can attack with target character this turn. The damage is based on the character base status plus 4.

title: Attack
text: You can attack with target character this turn. The damage is double of your character base status.

title: Attack
text: You can attack with target character this turn. The damage is based on the character base status plus 10.

title: Defense
text: You can use armor of target character this turn. Your armor is based on the character base status.

title: Defense
text: You can use armor of target character this turn. Your armor is based on the character base status plus 2.

title: Defense
text: You can use armor of target character this turn. Your armor is based on the character base status plus 4.

title: Defense
text: You can use armor of target character this turn. Your armor is double of your character base status.

title: Defense
text: You can use armor of target character this turn. Your armor is based on the character base status plus 10.

title: Defense
text: Your character life this turn is now your characters base status plus 2.

title: Defense
text: Your character life this turn is now your characters base status plus 4.

title: Defense
text: Your character life this turn is now the double of your characters base status.

title: Opportunity
text: Choose two- Draw 2 action cards; You can use 2 more actions this turn; Copy target action (you can choose new targets for the copy); You can attack and use armor with target character this turn.

title: Opportunity
text: Choose one- Draw 2 action cards; You can use 2 more actions this turn; Copy target action (you can choose new targets for the copy); You can attack and use armor with target character this turn.

title: Opportunity
text: Draw 2 action cards.

title: Opportunity
text: You can use 2 more actions this turn.

title: Opportunity
text: Copy target action (you can choose new targets for the copy).

title: Opportunity
text: You can attack and use armor with target character this turn.

title: Opportunity
text: Counter target action.

title: Opportunity
text: Counter target action. Then draw a card.

title: Draft
text: Draft this card face up, if you do, you may choose to pick two cards this turn, skip your next pick. {This card don't have effect in the game}.

title: Draft
text: Draft this card face up, if you do, you may choose to  pick tree cards this turn, skip your next two pick. {This card don't have  effect in the game}.

title: Draft
text: Draft this card face up, if you do, you may draw a extra card in your first hand in the game.{This card don't have  effect in the game}.

title: Discard
text: If you discard this card you may draw card.

title: Discard
text: If you discard this card you may draw a extra card next turn.
